author: wn.com
title: Government hotline proves popular for local residents (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Shanghai 's citizen service hotline 12345 has received more than 4.56 million calls since it opened three years ago and 99.4 percent of the complaints were solved, officials said yesterday. The
